switch_statement.comment: Swift switches must be exhaustive and can match many different patterns.
switch_statement.code:
switch someValue {
case 1:
    print("One")
case 2...5:
    print("Between 2 and 5")
default:
    print("Something else")
}
switch_statement.name: Switch statement

pattern_matching.comment: Swift has powerful pattern matching in `switch`, `if case`, `guard case`, and loops.
pattern_matching.code:
switch somePoint {
case (0, 0):
    print("Origin")
case (_, 0):
    print("On the x-axis")
case (0, _):
    print("On the y-axis")
case (-2...2, -2...2):
    print("Near the origin")
default:
    print("Outside area")
}
pattern_matching.name: Pattern matching
